95046402805215634.Text: Attribute-damaging spells actually destroy the eleven fundamental attributes of natural and supernatural beings: agility, endurance, fatigue, health, intelligence, luck, personality, speed, strength, willpower, magica. The victim's attributes are reduced permanently. The most common of these destruction spells are: curse agility, curse endurance, curse fatigue, curse health, curse intelligence, curse luck, curse personality, curse speed, curse strength, curse willpower, and curse spell points.
